page.shortlink: api sql namespace query object reset function
page.description: Reset the query as if it had just been created.

argument.name: SQL::Query
argument.description: A SQL::Query object created with a DIM statement.

page.discussion: The .Reset() method resets the values in the SQL::Query object as if it had just been created.
page.example: dim qry as SQL::Query qry.parse("Select * from Customer") ? qry.SQLStatement = "SELECT * FROM Customer" qry.reset() ? qry.SQLStatement = "SELECT"
